name: Tildes Dark and Flat
description: A dark and flat theme for tildes.net
additional_info:
Due to a bug (?) in stylish this style (and any style) will not work on tildes.net

Any style for tildes requires the stylus plugin for now.
To install this plugin it is recommended to install stylus
and either copy paste the CSS given here or to copy it
off of https://gitlab.com/jfecher/Tildes-DarkAndFlat

For more information on installing themes for tildes, visit
https://gitlab.com/Bauke/styles/wikis/Installing-Styles
